fields.name: Royal Gala Apples
fields.description: The Gala apple is a very sweet, aromatic eating apple. It has a cream background colour with a dense red stripe over. It has crisp, juicy flesh and is one of the most popular apple varieties.rnServing SuggestionrnRoyal Gala is a perfect added to salads or used in cooking. They are especially suitable for creating sauces.rn1 medium apple counts as 1 of your 5 a day.

fields.name: Organic Bananas 5 per pack
fields.description: Sweet organic bananas, perfect for enjoying as an afternoon snack or adding to breakfast and smoothies. 1 of your 5 a day. Do not refrigerate. Minimum five per pack.rnFeaturesrnOrganic is produced with fewer pesticides, no artificial colours or preservatives, no routine use of antibiotics, and no genetically modified ingredients or manufactured herbicides.rnFurther DescriptionrnDeliciously healthy foodrnBest enjoyed as part of a healthy lifestyle and a balanced varied diet.

fields.name: British Mature Cheddar 550g

fields.name: Comte Cheese

fields.name: Philadelphia Original Soft Cheese
fields.description: Made with milk and real cream, Philadelphia Original's distinct fresh and creamy taste makes it a delicious soft cheese for the whole family to enjoy. Philadelphia is fantastically versatile, whether you are using it to bake an indulgent cheesecake, spread in a lunchtime sandwich, or have in a pasta carbonara.rnPhiladelphia works well with both sweet and savoury dishes, and is available in a range of flavours to match your tastes.rnAlso available 340g pack and in Mini Tubs, which are a great alternative if you want to enjoy your Philadelphia at work or as a snack.rnFeaturesrnFresh and Creamy Taste, Made with Simply Good Ingredients Milk, Cream, Pinch of Salt, Made with pasteurised milk, No Preservatives, Suitable for Vegetarians

fields.name: British Semi Skimmed Milk

fields.name: Russell's Salmon Fillets Skin On
fields.description: Our quality assured Atlantic Salmon is responsibly farmedrnOther InformationrnFull Product Name:rnFarmed Salmon, skin on and boneless.rnStorage:rnKeep refrigerated 0-5C. Once open, use within one day, and do not exceed the use by date.rnSuitable for home freezing. Freeze straight away and use within three months. Defrost thoroughly before cooking and enjoy within one day.rnSafety Warning:rnWhile we've aimed to remove all the bones, please be careful just in case we've missed one.rnUsage:rn2 Servings

Once opened use immediately. This product was previously frozen and has been restored to chill temperature under carefully controlled conditions. It is still suitable for home freezing. Freeze straight away and use within three months. Defrost thoroughly before cooking and use within one day.rnSafety Warning:rnWhile we've aimed to remove all the bones, please be carefully just in case we've missed one.rnUsage:rn2 Servings

fields.name: Seedless Easy Peelers 600g
fields.description: Seedless Easy Peel OrangesrnFeaturesrnTangy, seedless easy peel oranges. 1 of your 5 a day. Naturally high in Vitamin C.rnStoragernRefrigerate for freshness.

fields.name: BerryWorld Blueberries 150g

Fat free and a fab way to get your 5-a-day, blueberries are the perfect mood booster. rnStoragernKeep refrigerated.rnBring to room temperature an hour before eating for an improved flavour.

fields.name: Medium Free Range Eggs 6 per pack
fields.description: Free-range eggs with deep brown coloured shells.rnFeaturesrnFabulous eggs by fabulous birds since 1928, With deep brown coloured shellsrnFurther DescriptionrnFor guidance on achieving perfectly poached eggs or recipe inspiration from dinner party canapï¿½s, to classic egg dishes.

fields.name: Slightly Salted Butter 250g
fields.description: Perfect for all your food adventures, be it baking, spreading, drizzling, mixing, fryingï¿½ we have a range of butter & spreadables to meet your needs. rnFeaturesrnSlightly Salted Butter is made from 100 pct fresh milk, We take the cream from the milk and churn until it turns into butter, just adding a pinch of salt, A distinctive, creamy, delicate, and fresh taste, rnSuitable for vegetariansrnStoragernKeep Refrigerated; Suitable for Home Freezing

fields.name: Greek Style Live Yogurt 500g
fields.description: Greek Style Live YogurtrnUnsweetened Greek-style natural yogurt made with British milk. Serves 5.rnFeaturesrnSuitable for vegetariansrnStoragernFor Use By, see lid. Keep refrigerated 0C to 5C. Not suitable for freezing. Once opened, consume within 3 days.

fields.name: Prawn Cocktail 200g
fields.description: A British classic of succulent, cold-water prawns in a creamy Marie Rose sauce, infused with brandy. Gluten free. Ready to eat. Serves 2.rnFeaturesrnResponsibly Sourced, Ready to Eat, Gluten freernStoragernFor Use By, see front of pack. Keep refrigerated 0C to 5C. Not suitable for freezing. Once opened, eat within 24 hours.

fields.name: Wild Cod Loin 250g
fields.description: A chunky prime cut from the meatiest part of the fishrnMoist & succulent with a clean flavour and delicious juicy flakesrnWild, line-caught in the icy, pristine waters of NorwayrnNaturally high in protein and low in fatrnFeaturesrnFree, not farmed, Lean & nutritious from a life swimming freernStoragernKeep Refrigerated; Suitable for Home Freezing

fields.name: Fish Pie Mix 320g
fields.description: Chunks of Cod, Salmon and Smoked Haddock. A balanced blend perfect for fish pies, casseroles, risottos or home-made fishcakes.rnStoragernKeep Refrigerated; Suitable for Home Freezing

fields.name: Cape 2 Hake Fillets 220g
fields.description: South African Cape 2 Hake FilletsrnFeaturesrnSkinless and boneless hake fillets with a mild and sweet flavour and a firm but succulent, flaking texture. High in protein. Simply pan-fry for eight to ten minutes. Two per pack.rnFurther DescriptionrnDeliciously healthy foodrnBest enjoyed as part of a healthy lifestyle and a balanced varied diet.rnStoragernKeep Refrigerated; Suitable for Home FreezingrnInstructionsrnShallow Fry - From Chilled. 8-10 minrnRemove all packaging. Season with salt and pepper. Heat a little oil in frying pan until hot. Fry over medium heat. Turn once. Thickness of fish may vary, thicker pieces will take longer to cook.rnDo not reheat.

fields.name: Organic Irish Smoked Salmon 200g
fields.description: Slowly smoked over smouldering oak in brick kilns on the West Coast of ScotlandrnSucculent and tender, with a delicate smoky taste. Delicious with a poached Daylesford Legbar egg on thin slices of our pumpernickel, or serve simply with fresh dill, a squeeze of lemon & creme fraiche.rnWhy Organic? We believe organic is better for our health, our animals and the environment; and of course always tastes better.rnThe fish are salted by hand and traditionally smoked in Inverawe's brick kilns, over gently smouldering oak log fires for up to 72 hours; depending on the weather. This careful, slow process results in rich, melt-in-the-mouth smoked salmon.rnFeaturesrnOrganicrnFurther DescriptionrnIt's recommended that we eat at least 2 portions of fish a week, one of which should be oily fish such as salmon, rich in Omega 3 fatty acids.rnStoragernKeep Refrigerated; Suitable for Home Freezing

fields.name: Beef Fillet Steak Typically 200g
fields.description: Min weight: 150grnMax weight: 250grnOur Ocado Beef Fillet steak is carefully selected and matured slowly over 21 days to deliver a succulent, tender and richly flavoured steak.rnWe mature all of our prime steak cuts for a minimum of 21 days a succulent and tender eat.rnIf you find your steak has become brown where the meat is touching the packaging or in-between steaks this is because meat needs air to stay red in colour and it is the lack of air between the steak and the packaging that has caused this discolouration. This is called contact discolouration and will not affect the safety or flavour of the product.rnStoragernKeep refrigerated between -2C to +4C.rnOnce opened, use immediately.rnDo not exceed the Use By date.rnSuitable for freezing. Freeze on or before the Use By date. Use within 1 month. Defrost thoroughly before cooking and consume on day of defrosting. Do not refreeze.rnInstructionsrnCooking Instructions:rnRemove all packaging. Wash hands, all surfaces and utensils after touching raw meat. Keep raw meat separate from cooked foods.rnNot suitable for microwave cooking.rnPan FryrnAllow the steak to sit at room temperature for 10 minutes before cooking.rnPreheat pan on high. Lightly oil and season steak. Place into a dry pan. Turn halfway through cooking Rare: 5-8 minutes, Medium: 7-10 minutes.rnAllow to rest for 5 minutes before serving.rnAll appliances vary, these are guidelines only. Ensure product is piping hot before serving. Do not re-heat.

fields.name: Beef Rump Steak 255g
fields.description: Beef Rump steak is carefully selected and matured slowly over 21 days to deliver a succulent, tender and richly flavoured steak. The rump steak is a firm family favourite.rnWe mature all of our prime steak cuts for a minimum of 21 days a succulent and tender eat.rnStoragernKeep refrigerated between -2C to +4C.rnOnce opened, use immediately.rnDo not exceed the Use By date.rnSuitable for freezing. Freeze on or before the Use By date. Use within 1 month. Defrost thoroughly before cooking and consume on day of defrosting. Do not refreeze.rnInstructionsrnCooking Instructions:rnRemove all packaging. Wash hands, all surfaces and utensils after touching raw meat. Keep raw meat separate from cooked foods.rnNot suitable for microwave cooking.rnPan FryrnAllow the steak to sit at room temperature for 10 minutes before cooking. rnPreheat pan on high. Lightly oil and season steak. Place into a dry pan. Turn halfway through cooking Rare: 2-3 minutes, Medium: 3-6 minutes.rnAllow to rest for 5 minutes before serving.rnAll appliances vary, these are guidelines only. Ensure product is piping hot before serving. Do not re-heat.

fields.name: 2 Lamb Leg Steaks 300g
fields.description: Lamb Leg Steaks are a lean and tender cut. These leg steaks are ideal for frying or grilling.rnStoragernKeep refrigerated at -2C to +4C.rnOnce opened, use immediately.rnDo not exceed the Use By date.rnSuitable for freezing. Freeze on or before the Use By date. Use within 1 month. Defrost thoroughly before cooking and consume on day of defrosting. Do not refreeze.rnInstructionsrnCooking Instructions:rnRemove all packaging. Wash hands, surfaces and utensils after touching raw meat. Keep raw meat separate from cooked foods.rnNot suitable for microwave cooking.rnPan-FryrnFor best results Pan-Fry.rnPan-fry steaks over a high heat in a little oil for 1 minute each side, reduce to medium heat and cook for:rnMedium: 3 mins each side.rnWell done: 4 mins each side.rnGrillrnMedium: 4-6 mins each side.rnWell done: 6-8 mins each side.rnAll appliances vary, these are guidelines only. Ensure product is piping hot before serving. Do not re-heat.

fields.name: Rack of Lamb Typically 500g
fields.description: StoragernOnce opened, use immediately.rnDo not exceed the Use By date.rnSuitable for freezing. Freeze on or before the Use By date. Use within 1 month. Defrost thoroughly before cooking and consume on day of defrosting. Do not refreeze.rnInstructionsrnCooking Instructions:rnRemove all packaging. Wash hands, surfaces and utensils after touching raw meat. Keep raw meat separate from cooked foods.rnNot suitable for microwave cooking.rnOvenrnElectric 200CrnFan 180CrnGas Mark 6rnPre-heat oven. Remove all packaging and place lamb rack is a tray. Place in the oven and cook for 10 minutes per 100g for medium. 12 minutes per 100g for well done.rnAllow to rest for a minimum of 10 minutes before consuming.rnAll appliances vary, these are guidelines only. Ensure product is piping hot before serving. Do not re-heat.

fields.name: Pork Fillet Medallions 300g
fields.description: Our new range of pork cuts are from pigs that are free to roam outside and are fed on only vegetarian feed. The system guarantees that the piglets are born outdoors and reared without the use of antibiotics from birth. Such a high level of welfare means that there is a consistent supply of healthy, natural pig meat from happy pigs.rnFeaturesrnOutdoor bred, Raised without antibiotics, Flavours without frontiers, RSPCA AssuredrnrnStoragernCannot be cooked from Frozen; Cannot be Microwaved; Suitable for Home Freezing; Keep RefrigeratedrnInstructionsrnShallow Fry - From Chilled. Always wash hands, all surfaces and utensils after handling raw meat.rnRemove all packaging.rnPreheat a little oil in a pan over a medium-high heat, carefully place the medallions in the pan and cook for the time specified above, turning occasionally. Drain before serving.rnEnsure that the product is thoroughly cooked, no pink meat remains and the juices run clear.rnDo not reheat.rnNo suitable for microwave cooking.rnNot suitable for cooking from frozen.rnAll cooking appliances vary.rnThis is a guide only.

fields.name: Organic Pork Joint 1kg
fields.description: FeaturesrnOrganicrnStoragernKeep Refrigerated; Suitable for Home FreezingrnInstructionsrnOven cook - From Chilled. For perfectly cooked pork, our head chef recommends:rnLeg & Loin Joint: Season with salt, pepper and olive oil. Pan-fry until golden brown all over, then place in a hot oven. Roast for 30 minutes per 500g, plus a further 30 minutes, until the pork is cooked through with no pink meat, and the juices run clear. Allow to rest for 5-10 minutes before serving.rnPreparation and UsagernWash hands, knives and surfaces thoroughly before and after preparing raw meat.

fields.name: Game Diced Venison 500g
fields.description: All of our game is free to roam over the countryside ensuring a wide and varied diet. This gives the meat its wonderful gamey flavour. The highest standards are employed to allow a sustainable environment for all the wild game to flourish. These practices also create the perfect habitat for our song birds and wildlife to thrive.rnStoragernKeep refrigerated 0C to +4C, once opened use within 24 hours. If freezing, do so on the day you buy it and use within one month.rnDefrost thoroughly in fridge before cooking. Do not re-freeze after thawing and use within 24 hours. Keep refrigerated.rnrnOther InformationrnWarning: This product may contain lead shots

fields.name: Game Venison Steak 250g
fields.description: All our game is free to roam over the countryside ensuring a wide and varied diet. This gives the meat its wonderful gamey flavour. The highest standards are employed to allow a sustainable environment for all wild game to flourish. These practices also create the perfect habitat for our songbirds and wildlife to thrive.rnStoragernKeep refrigerated 0 C to 4 C, once opened use within 24 hours. If freezing, do so on the day you buy it and use it within one month.rnDefrost thoroughly in the fridge before cooking. Do not re-freeze after thawing and use within 24 hours. Keep refrigerated.rnCountry of OriginrnUKrnOther InformationrnMay contain lead shot or product of shooting.

fields.name: Green Seedless Grapes 500g
fields.description: Crisp, sweet and juicy. Grapes are a good source of fibre and vitamin C. A handful of grapes count as one of your 5-a-day.  Instructions. Wash before use
